summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from January 1, 2014, to January 31, 2014. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer of $60,000. The document is marked confidential and includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $60,000 was made to SunTrust Bank from the account.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $6,150.91 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $535,970,940.16 on January 1, 2014.
The ending balance as of January 31, 2014, was $35,917,091.07.
A significant outgoing transfer of $60,000 occurred on January 6, 2014.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during this statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $6,150.91.
